stories.Title: SREday in London
stories.Description: Mark your calendar for SREday in London on 14-15 September! Join fellow tech enthusiasts for a two-day event featuring 50+ talks. Secure your early bird tickets now, before they run out!
stories.Tweet: SREday in London 📦 Mark your calendar for SREday in London on 14-15 September! Join fellow tech enthusiasts for a two-day event featuring 50+ talks. Secure your early bird tickets now, before they run out! #SRE https://sreday.com/?unpack

stories.Title: Stack Overflow announces OverflowAI
stories.Description: OverflowAI introduces an enhanced search experience with the help of Generative AI, ensuring developers' queries align more precisely with their research topics.
stories.Tweet: Stack Overflow announces OverflowAI 📦 OverflowAI introduces an enhanced search experience with the help of Generative AI, ensuring developers' queries align more precisely with their research topics. #ai https://www.marktechpost.com/2023/07/30/stack-overflow-launches-overflow-the-integration-of-developers-community-and-ai/

stories.Title: Large language models for dummies
stories.Description: If large language models, like ChatGPT, have caught your attention, this article delivers an easy-to-understand explanation of how they work without overwhelming you with technical details.
stories.Tweet: Large language models for dummies 📦 If large language models, like ChatGPT, have caught your attention, this article delivers an easy-to-understand explanation of how they work without overwhelming you with technical details. #ai https://arstechnica.com/science/2023/07/a-jargon-free-explanation-of-how-ai-large-language-models-work/

stories.Title: The art of the prompt
stories.Description: Prompt engineering is the key to unlocking AI's true potential. Discover how to create the perfect prompt to match your expectations.

stories.Title: Introducing: Tiptap
stories.Description: With Tiptap's suite of open-source tools and cloud services, web developers can now create sophisticated content editing experiences faster and easier.
stories.Tweet: Introducing: Tiptap 📦 With Tiptap's suite of open-source tools and cloud services, web developers can now create sophisticated content editing experiences faster and easier. #ai https://www.producthunt.com/posts/tiptap-2

stories.Title: Countdown to the stars
stories.Description: Crewed missions to the ISS are cleared for takeoff after resolving technical challenges. Save the date for NASA's Crew-7 launch on Aug. 17 and prepare for the upcoming Soyuz MS-24 mission on Sept. 15.
stories.Tweet: Countdown to the stars 📦 Crewed missions to the ISS are cleared for takeoff after resolving technical challenges. Save the date for NASA's Crew-7 launch on Aug. 17 and prepare for the upcoming Soyuz MS-24 mission on Sept. 15. #rocketscience https://spacenews.com/crew-dragon-soyuz-missions-set-for-launches-to-iss/

stories.Title: Aeolus' journey ends safely
stories.Description: Though designed two decades ago without specific re-entry capabilities, ESA's Aeolus satellite successfully concluded its mission with a carefully planned descent over the Atlantic Ocean.
stories.Tweet: Aeolus' journey ends safely 📦 Though designed two decades ago without specific re-entry capabilities, ESA's Aeolus satellite successfully concluded its mission with a carefully planned descent over the Atlantic Ocean. #ESA https://arstechnica.com/space/2023/07/european-satellite-plunges-back-to-earth-in-first-of-its-kind-assisted-re-entry/

stories.Title: Hello? Is Voyager 2 out there?
stories.Description: NASA's Voyager 2 experienced a temporary loss of communication due to a slight antenna misalignment caused by planned commands. The probe's regular orientation reset is scheduled for Oct. 15.
stories.Tweet: Hello? Is Voyager 2 out there? 📦 NASA's Voyager 2 experienced a temporary loss of communication due to a slight antenna misalignment caused by planned commands. The probe's regular orientation reset is scheduled for Oct. 15. #NASA https://www.pcmag.com/news/nasa-loses-contact-with-voyager-2

stories.Title: Save up, iPhone fans
stories.Description: Mark Gurman's latest newsletter continues to hint at "minor" price hikes, especially for the iPhone 15 Pro and Pro Max. The titanium chassis and advanced camera system may justify the increase.
stories.Tweet: Save up, iPhone fans 📦 Mark Gurman's latest newsletter continues to hint at "minor" price hikes, especially for the iPhone 15 Pro and Pro Max. The titanium chassis and advanced camera system may justify the increase. #apple https://9to5mac.com/2023/07/30/gurman-iphone-15-pro-price-dark-gray-watch-ultra/

stories.Title: Premium features at a compact price
stories.Description: As electric vehicles gain popularity, Volvo's EX30 makes a compelling case for affordability and practicality. Undoubtedly, this model holds the potential to become a crowd favorite.
stories.Tweet: Premium features at a compact price 📦 As electric vehicles gain popularity, Volvo's EX30 makes a compelling case for affordability and practicality. stories.Title: From a little blue bird into an X
stories.Description: Twitter's rebrand journey showcases the complexities involved in large-scale platform changes. Microsoft Edge's security warnings and Apple's naming rules have made the transition tricky for users.
stories.Tweet: From a little blue bird into an X 📦 Twitter's rebrand journey showcases the complexities involved in large-scale platform changes. Microsoft Edge's security warnings and Apple's naming rules have made the transition tricky for users. #twitter https://www.windowscentral.com/software-apps/twitter-x-rebrand-causes-mayhem-on-microsoft-edge-and-apple-app-store

title: Voyager 2 loses contact, Aeolus lands safely, From Twitter to X
description: Today's newsletter is filled with exciting bits! Voyager 2 is out there in the universe with a misaligned antenna, but no worries, the mission is not at risk! I've followed Aeolus' journey for a while now. I have to admit the safe landing got me emotional. And if you're asking, yes, I'm still getting used to posting "tweets" on "X."
